message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its unique value, I believe a price of $1,300,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?

Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the value it holds, but given my budget constraints, I'm unable to meet the price of $1,300,000. I'm willing to pay up to $950,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, however, the value of this product is truly exceptional and I can't let it go for less than $1,100,000.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $1,000,000 for it, which is the highest I can afford. If this is not acceptable, I will consider purchasing the product from John.
